ygData.subject: hacking eq
ygData.msgSnippet: I thought about doing a little hacking. I have an extra computer collecting dust right now. My plan is to put two network cards on and linux on it. Have the
ygData.messageBody:
I thought about doing a little hacking. I have an extra computer collecting
dust right now. My plan is to put two network cards on and linux on it. Have
the network traffic go through the first computer, then to my game computer.
Then I can do all the packet sniffing I want without bothering the game
client. I was thinking about making a little client on the linux box with
vector graphics showing your position and the position of all local mobs.
Like a radar.

I also want to make a better messaging system. Like check every so often
your friends list to see when friends are on. And display which friends are
on line. And have seperate friends lists for each server.

Another thing I think would be cool would be to make bots. I was thinking a
healbot would be pretty easy. To activate you do a "/m healbot join".
Healbot would then join your party. His sole job would be to cast heal
spells on the members of the party. I imagine I could get a lot of exp while
at work. :) I was think he would be gnomish clockwork so that he could even
be in character. :)

Unfortunately I have a job and do not found the time to do any of this yet.
